name:
Advocating Child Welfare
Proposing Pet Medical Insurance Plan!
content: Create a Pet Medical Fund: Allocate NT$1 billion annually to support family pets' medical expenses.
Medical Aid: Pets can receive up to NT$20,000 in annual medical assistance, easing owners' financial burden.
Partnerships with 200+ Animal Hospitals: In discussions for collaboration with numerous animal hospitals.

name:
Building Leisure Paradise
Promoting Pet-Friendly Spaces!
content: Build Pet Parks: Allocate NT$500 million yearly to establish at least 10 dedicated pet parks nationwide in the first year.
Foster Pet-Friendly Businesses: Encourage businesses with tax incentives; over 500 expected to join in the first year.
Host Pet Events: Partner with pet communities for at least 5 major events annually, including talent competitions and workshops.

name:
Elevating Love with Expertise!
Promoting Pet Care Education
content: Launch Pet Education Centers: Allocate NT$300 million annually to establish centers in at least 5 major cities in the first year.
Offer Free Pet Care Courses: Partner with schools and communities for over 10,000 citizens to benefit annually.
Create Educational Resources: Publish manuals, videos, and online courses for easy access to accurate pet care knowledge.

name:
Opposing Appearance Discrimination!
Breaking Pet Stereotypes
content: Foster Dog-Friendly Awareness: Allocate NT$50 million yearly for correct knowledge in shelters, dispelling appearance stereotypes.
Black Dog Beauty Contest: Allocate NT$200 million annually to challenge perceptions and raise awareness.
Train Rescue Volunteers: Equip volunteers for stray dog rehabilitation, guide publication, and international pet adoption coordination.
